entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
